title: Market share of leading insurance companies in Belgium 2015 to 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 18 different Insurance Companys on X-axis for 4 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.
Insurance Company AG Insurance had the maximum Market share among all 4 groups, and it was for 2016. The minimum Market share was observed in Insurance Company Foyer for 2015.
In Insurance Company AG Insurance, 2016 had the highest Market share among all 18 Insurance Companys and it has the lowest Market share in Insurance Company Delta Lloyd.
There is a gap of 223.0 between the highest and lowest Market share found for 2016 in Insurance Company AG Insurance and Delta Lloyd.

In Insurance Company AG Insurance, 2016 had the highest Market share 224.0 among the 4 groups and in Foyer, 2015 had the lowest Market share 0.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 18 different Insurance Companys on X-axis for 4 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Market share.
Insurance Company AG Insurance had the maximum Market share among all 4 groups, and it was for 2016. The minimum Market share was observed in Insurance Company Foyer for 2015.
In Insurance Company AG Insurance, 2016 had the highest Market share among all 18 Insurance Companys and it has the lowest Market share in Insurance Company Delta Lloyd.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Market share on the Y-axis for 18 different Insurance Companys for 4 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
Insurance Company AG Insurance had the maximum Market share among all 4 groups, and it was for 2016. The minimum Market share was observed in Insurance Company Foyer for 2015.
Among all the Insurance Companys, 2016 had the highest Market share 224.0 in Insurance Company AG Insurance and lowest value 0.0 in Insurance Company Delta Lloyd.
The maximum Market share for 2016 that was found in Insurance Company AG Insurance was 224.0 times larger than the minimum Market share observed in Insurance Company Delta Lloyd.
Out of all 4 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Market share was found in case of 2016.

In Insurance Company AG Insurance, 2016 had the highest Market share 224.0 among the 4 groups and in Foyer, 2015 had the lowest Market share 0.0. The second highest Market share 208.0 was observed for 2016 in Insurance Company AG Insurance.
Averaging all 4 groups 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018, the Insurance Company AG Insurance is the maximum Market share and Foyer is the minimum Market share.
